column4: we ccan't sell breezy users to upgarde for another year yet :D
we can only tell warty people to upgrade
uhm.. why ? is breezy an LTS release then ?
it's not been completely discarded yet... only warty has. we can tell hoary people to upgade when feisty's released

advising people to upgrade has very little to do with whether it's still supported, in  my view - Ubuntu is heavily under development, and even Dapper will have many advantages over breezy, whether breezy is EOL or not.
must upgrade vs. can and probably should upgrade
